appInsightsName.description: Name for the Azure Application Insights resource (friendly)

appLocation.description: Location for the index of the application. Used as configuration for the web server to determine where to source files from.

FUNCTIONAPP_URI.description: Eventual URL of the web application on Azure

id.description: Identifier of the Azure DevOps variable group (library).

location.description: Datacentre location for the Azure resources.

name.description: Name for the Azure Static Web App.

pipelineHTML.description: Name of the Azure DevOps pipeline that produces the build artifacts.

subscription.description: GUID of the Azure subscription where the resources should be deployed.

token.description: Token that is used to deploy resources to the web server (Azure Static Apps).

workspaceId.description: Fully qualified resource name for the Application Insights that will host the logging of the application.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name for the Azure resources.

serviceConnection.description: Name of the Azure DevOps service connection that grants access to a Service Principal to connect to Azure.

sku.description: sku for the Azure Static Web App.

skuCode.description: skuCode for the Azure Static Web App.
